text: Barbara Rush (January 4, 1927 - March 31, 2024) was an American stage, movie, and television actress. She was known for her roles in It Came from Outer Space!, Bigger Than Life, When Worlds Collide, The Young Philadelphians, and Robin and the Seven Hoods. She also appeared on television shows such as Peyton Place, Batman, All My Children, 7th Heaven and Knight Rider. She won a Golden Globe Award in 1954. Rush died on March 31, 2024 at a care home in Westlake Village, California at the age of 97. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:1927 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Denver Category:Actors from Santa Barbara, California
title: Barbara Rush
